nodes.text: The B-12 bacta transport was manufactured by Kuat Drive Yards specifically to transport bacta.

The B-12's hulls was a spinoff of the Lancer-class frigate and was 238 meters long. The ship carried 26 crew, 6 passengers, and 600,000 metric tons of bacta in sixteen pressurized spheres with controlled temperature to keep the bacta from spoiling.
